product_name: The North Face TKA 100 Microvelour Pants - Women's Short
long_description: The short-length North Face TKA 100 Microvelour pants have an unparalleled soft hand and have gained impressive efficiencies over the original TKA microfleece fabric. Read on for the details! Updated Polartec(R) TKA 100 microfleece provides 10% more warmth and 50% more thermal efficiency than the original TKA 100 at 27% less weight. Fabric is also 24% more breathable and 18% more compressible, giving way to 14 cu. in. of pack space savings. TKA 100 Microvelour pants provide warmth without the weight and bulk of traditional insulating fabrics, and are highly breathable for comfort during numerous activities. Pill-resistant pants dry quickly to minimize heat loss. Fabric provides UPF 30 protection from harmful solar rays. Internal drawcord and hidden back zip pocket. Fit is easy through the hips and thighs and widens a bit at the ankles.
